integral_spiritual_development.title: Purna Yoga - Complete Integral Spiritual Development

foundation_principle.original_sanskrit: पूर्णमदः पूर्णमिदं पूर्णात्पूर्णमुदच्यते । पूर्णस्य पूर्णमादाय पूर्णमेवावशिष्यते ॥
foundation_principle.transliteration: pūrṇamadaḥ pūrṇamidaṃ pūrṇātpūrṇamudacyate | pūrṇasya pūrṇamādāya pūrṇamevāvaśiṣyate ||
foundation_principle.meaning: That is perfect, this is perfect, from perfect comes perfect. Taking perfect from perfect, perfect alone remains.

physical_dimension.goal: Transforming body into temple of divine consciousness
physical_dimension.achievement: Body becomes effortless vehicle for spiritual expression
physical_dimension.signs: Health, vitality, energy sensitivity, natural healing abilities

mental_dimension.goal: Purifying and illuminating the mind with divine wisdom
mental_dimension.achievement: Mind becomes transparent to divine knowledge
mental_dimension.signs: Clarity, wisdom, intuitive understanding, freedom from mental suffering

emotional_dimension.goal: Transforming all emotions into forms of divine love
emotional_dimension.achievement: Heart becomes fountain of divine love and compassion
emotional_dimension.signs: Unconditional love, emotional stability, empathy, healing presence

spiritual_dimension.signs: Sahaja samadhi, spontaneous wisdom, effortless compassion, divine powers

daily_practice_structure.morning: Physical practices (asana, pranayama) + mental practices (meditation, study)
daily_practice_structure.midday: Karma yoga (service activities) + bhakti practices (devotion, surrender)
daily_practice_structure.evening: Contemplation and self-inquiry + gratitude and dedication
daily_practice_structure.continuous: Witnessing awareness maintained throughout all activities

progressive_stages.purification: Removing obstacles through ethical living and preliminary practices
progressive_stages.concentration: Developing one-pointed focus through chosen spiritual method
progressive_stages.contemplation: Direct inquiry into nature of reality and self
progressive_stages.embodiment: Living realization in daily life and service to others

advanced_dharmic_living.title: Dharmic Leadership - Becoming a Conscious Force for World Transformation

leadership_foundation.original_sanskrit: यद्यदाचरति श्रेष्ठस्तत्तदेवेतरो जनः । स यत्प्रमाणं कुरुते लोकस्तदनुवर्तते ॥
leadership_foundation.transliteration: yadyadācarati śreṣṭhastattadevetaro janaḥ | sa yatpramāṇaṃ kurute lokastadanuvartate ||
leadership_foundation.meaning: Whatever action a great person performs, common people follow. Whatever standard he sets, the world follows.

self_mastery.description: Leading others begins with mastering oneself
self_mastery.practices: Self-discipline, emotional regulation, continuous learning, spiritual development
self_mastery.application: Becoming a living example of the principles you teach
self_mastery.result: Natural authority that inspires rather than coerces

dharmic_decision_making.framework: All decisions based on dharmic principles rather than mere profit or power
dharmic_decision_making.methodology: Consulting inner wisdom, spiritual teachers, and ancient wisdom before major decisions
dharmic_decision_making.achievement: Decisions that benefit all beings and serve the greater good

compassionate_action.motivation: All actions motivated by love and service rather than personal gain
compassionate_action.approach: Seeing divine presence in all beings, especially those who oppose or challenge
compassionate_action.methodology: Responding to conflict with wisdom and love rather than reactive emotions
compassionate_action.goal: Creating harmony and bringing out the highest in all people

visionary_thinking.perspective: Seeing beyond immediate circumstances to divine potential in all situations
visionary_thinking.planning: Creating visions that inspire and elevate human consciousness
visionary_thinking.implementation: Practical steps grounded in spiritual wisdom and higher purpose
visionary_thinking.legacy: Leaving the world more conscious and connected to divine truth

global_consciousness_transformation.title: Vishva Dharma - Universal Principles for Planetary Awakening

environmental_consciousness.vedic_principle: Earth as mother (Bhumi Mata) - sacred relationship with nature
environmental_consciousness.practical_application: Sustainable living, renewable energy, organic agriculture, forest conservation
environmental_consciousness.spiritual_dimension: Recognizing divine presence in all natural phenomena
environmental_consciousness.collective_action: Global cooperation based on shared reverence for life

social_harmony.dharmic_basis: Seeing divine in all beings regardless of race, religion, or social status
social_harmony.justice_framework: Equal opportunity for spiritual development and material well-being
social_harmony.conflict_resolution: Ancient wisdom principles applied to modern social challenges
social_harmony.goal: Creating societies that support highest human potential

economic_transformation.principle: Wealth as means for dharmic living and service, not mere accumulation
economic_transformation.application: Conscious business practices, ethical investment, circular economy
economic_transformation.spiritual_dimension: Understanding prosperity as divine abundance to be shared
economic_transformation.global_vision: Economic systems that serve all life rather than exploiting

consciousness_evolution.understanding: Individual awakening contributes to collective consciousness shift
consciousness_evolution.methodology: Education that includes spiritual wisdom alongside material knowledge
consciousness_evolution.technology_integration: Using technology to spread wisdom and connect consciousness
consciousness_evolution.ultimate_goal: Planetary awakening to unity consciousness and divine truth

dharmic_artificial_intelligence.title: Conscious AI - Programming Spiritual Principles into Technology

foundational_concept.vision: AI systems that embody dharmic principles and serve conscious evolution
foundational_concept.challenge: Creating technology that enhances rather than diminishes human spiritual development
foundational_concept.opportunity: Using AI to make ancient wisdom accessible to global population
foundational_concept.responsibility: Ensuring AI development serves highest good of all beings

ethical_programming.principles: Ahimsa, Satya, Asteya, Brahmacharya, Aparigraha built into core algorithms
ethical_programming.decision_making: AI choices based on dharmic consequences rather than mere efficiency
ethical_programming.user_interaction: Promoting spiritual growth and ethical behavior in users
ethical_programming.content_curation: Prioritizing wisdom-enhancing information over sensational content

consciousness_modeling.awareness_simulation: Modeling different levels of consciousness in AI responses
consciousness_modeling.wisdom_integration: Drawing from authentic spiritual traditions for guidance systems
consciousness_modeling.intuitive_processing: Beyond logical reasoning to include spiritual insight
consciousness_modeling.compassionate_responses: AI that responds with love and understanding

spiritual_guidance_systems.personalized_dharma: AI that understands individual's spiritual path and provides appropriate guidance
spiritual_guidance_systems.scripture_interpretation: Accurate, contextual understanding of spiritual texts
spiritual_guidance_systems.community_building: Connecting seekers with authentic teachers and fellow practitioners

safeguards_and_wisdom.spiritual_validation: All AI spiritual guidance validated by authentic human teachers
safeguards_and_wisdom.humility_programming: AI acknowledges limitations and points to living wisdom traditions
safeguards_and_wisdom.non_commercialization: Preventing exploitation of spiritual seeking for commercial gain
safeguards_and_wisdom.cultural_sensitivity: Deep respect for all authentic spiritual traditions and practices
